channel.title: Teleport if in certain area?

item.title: Teleport if in certain area?
item.dc:creator: @iHybridu iHybridu
item.description:
@iHybridu wrote:

How can I make a player teleport if they are in a certain area?

I tried things like this:

	public boolean teleportOut() {
			if(absX > 3165 && absX < 3186 && absY > 2976 && absY < 2996) {	
			getPA().movePlayer(2632, 1247, 0);
			return true;
			}else{
			return false;
	}
}

But it just wouldnâ€™t do the job.

Read full topic
